response.overview: A kind and loving old man (Jacobo Morales) shares photos of his life with his good friend Concho, a young and naive toad. Each image transports him to memories of a different Puerto Rico, a time when everything was different. Today, the country he once knew has changed profoundly, but the old man still holds out hope for a better future.
response.title: DeBí TiRAR MáS FOTos
